import firebase from"firebase";//need a config
var firebaseConfig={apiKey:process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_KEY,authDomain:"netflix2-clone-e95d8.firebaseapp.com",projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_PROJECT_ID,storageBucket:process.env.REACT_APP_STORAGE_BUCKET,messagingSenderId:process.env.REACT_APP_MESSAGING_SENDERID,appId:process.env.REACT_APP_APPID};var firebaseApp=firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);//firestore() is a real-time database which allow us to keep track of what the user subscription is
var db=firebaseApp.firestore();var auth=firebase.auth();//we can only have one default export but many explicit export
export{auth};export default db;
